Name: Spartans Vs Zombies Defense
About the game: In this tug-of-war, casual defense game， you play Leonidas who is the hero-king of Sparta, against hordes of attacking zombies in Thermopylae. Recruit allies and build defenses to stop them! ● Leonidas actually learned magic, very useful, very powerful, very funny. ● A wide variety of allies to summon including swordsmen, Royal Guards, archers, witches and more. ● More flexible combination of tactics. ● Special supply system. ● 60 waves in classic mode, and after accomplished difficulty will increase. ● 3 kinds of endless mode, wilder, more fun. ● Beautiful graphics, epic battle.
